block.p: BLY-Sylvia. September 29, 2000 (nee Ferber). Beloved wife of the late Samuel, formerly of New York City. Loving mother of Eleanor and Bill. Dear sister of Mildred and Leon. Loving grandmother of Deborah, Will, Sarah & Rebecca. Caring great aunt of Jeff. Graveside services were held October 1st. For information Goldstein's Rosenberg's Raphael Sacks, Phila, Pennsylvania, (800) 622-6410.
